name: freak-show-127
text:
HEADER
Podcast: freak-show
Episode: freak-show-127
Starttime: Wed Feb 26 2014 20:00:00 GMT+0100 (CET)
relativeTimestamps: no
Endtime: Wed Feb 26 2014 20:00:00 GMT+0100 (CET)
Podcaster: Tim Pritlove (@timpritlove), Denis Ahrens (@denis2342), hukl (@hukl), roddi (@roddi), Ralf Stockmann (@rstockm)
Shownoter: vale <https://alpha.app.net/vale>, @konfluenzpunkt <https://alpha.app.net/konfluenzpunkt> @fabi <https://alpha.app.net/fabi>, mrmoe <https://alpha.app.net/moe>
Chat: <http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=freakshow>
Stream: <http://streams.xenim.de/metaebene.mp3>
Webseite: <http://freakshow.fm>
Episodepage: <http://freakshow.fm/fs127-the-number-of-the-denis>

Titelvorschläge
    - Intergalactic Evangelist
    - Akustischer Führer
    - WM Facepalm
    - Spritzig
    - Selbstverschuldetes Leid
    
    
/HEADER
